Reviews.Title: “Scary place to stay, like from a Hitchcock movie. Stay away.”

Reviews.Content: chose stay le piano 1 looked cute pictures 2 gotten lot glowing reviews tripadvisor short time operation booked complete confidence wish nice instead im preface review saying am mellow easygoing person traveled hundreds hotels world business im stranger nofrills operations horrifying happened hotel ranked bottom hotels ive stayed wit arrived istanbul hot muggy day july 101 functioning air conditioning despite hotel advertised ac units apparently tried compensate deficiency putting fan bed terribly helpful matters worse windows bedroom crack hotel supply sheets blankets expect normal hotel instead bed covered single thin scratchy bed spread cover bed toilet paper holder fell clean wall tug roll reattached lights hallway mode programmed detected movement meant fumble key card dark constantly pace forth hallway digging purse avoid annoying effect minibar fridge didnt cold dont usually minibar snacking medication refrigerated minibars purpose destroyed half time elevator didnt didnt bother 2 flights phone started south hot uncomfortable quick cold shower functioning window threw bedspread aside door climbed bed au wrapped towel woke little midnight door hanging middleaged wandering remember bed little disoriented struck deeply troubling strange carrying im bed naked grabbed blanket quickly cover fumbled bed looking south hell doing language understand didnt wandered probably minute eternity finally wouldnt respond polite request leave screamed top lungs thank god door exactly happened looked phone call front desk wasnt clothes wearing earlier day walked front desk tell shown middle night uninvited concierge didnt stood telling shown sleeping didnt finally bellhop concierge guy talked forth turkish concierge telling explanation bellhop strange forgotten key guess gotten mixed floor furthermore according concierge reason strange didnt leave confused wife move 1 sweltering hot 2 scared concierge reprogram lock key mine door words hotel master keys disabled please trust 20 times couldnt understand single woman traveling happened kept saying trust trust earned hotel strangers wander peoples double checking belong hotel doors outside theyve left hotel nearly oclock morning taxis streets idea else upstairs cant slept rest night morning downstairs concierge agreed change door key didnt maids passing swiped master key fine concierge night complete incompetent lied reprogramming lock anyway changed functioning ac windows stayed hotel 3 nights prebooked stay recommend else onceinalifetime experience cost 295 euros 3 nights couldnt pay stay
